input.sentences: so we got a new tractor at work today .
the scoop is way bigger than our old one .
here it is from the back hauling our green machine .
output.sentences: Brad is a fan of tractors but he has one tractor that is his favorite.
He says this tractor gets more done because it has a bigger scoop.
He also says it's his favorite because he can drive over more types of terrain with his fancy tires.
I thought he was lying when he said it was a Lamborghini but I was proven wrong as I looked at the brands signature on the back.
That thing really is a mean green hauling machine!
